name: One Of Us 7drl
description:
One Of Us is a hex tile roguelike.

You are tasked with find the Golden Fleas (there are four on them). Along the way you will meet lots of interesting and unusual friends who will join your party. But too many friends will mean you will become 'One Of Us'!

Travel over random islands and caves, uncover hoards of friends, gather the locations of the Golden Fleas. Are they in the many Chests that have been left around? Or maybe there is a fabulous treasure to give to your merry band of misfits.

Whatever you do, choose wisely as you only get one life and death comes in many different forms.

This game was made over seven days for the 7DRL challenge 2020. It was written in MX2 and uses custom graphics and sound routines by me.

Sound has been created and sequenced in QasarBeach CMI.

Graphics were created in FontSprite.

Will you accept the challenge?

Will Mr Snips goes completely nuts from too much sun and fun?

Why did the Fleas escape?

How do you recruit pirates?

Who is Sister Matik?

What is Rodent Nibbling?

And why is this soo much fun?

Install instructions

Requires OpenAL, OpenGL2+ and a 64bit OS

If there are any issues, just let me know :)
